article_title: Obama And His Policies Have Been A Boon To Temporary Workers

article_metadata.author: Merrill Matthews

og.description: There has been a lot of discussion about how Obamacare and other liberal policies are shifting people from full-time to part-time work; but the real trend is toward more temporary services, which may be even less secure than part-time work.
og.title: Obama And His Policies Have Been A Boon To Temporary Workers
